hints.content: Let's try each strategy one at a time to see if they work.

Add $35+5$ then add $10$.

>$\begin{align}\greenD{35}+\purpleC{15}&=\greenD{35}+(\purpleC{5}+\purpleC{10})\\
&=(\greenD{35}+\purpleC{5})+\purpleC{10}\\
\end{align}$

>Yes, this strategy works.

**The following strategies can be used to add $35+15$.**

- Add $35+5$ then add $10$.

- Add $30+20$.
